name: Action! Action!
blurb: Action! Action! is an original feature-length action movie based in Downtown Las Vegas, scheduled to start filming Fall 2021.

name: Evenfall | A Post-Apocalyptic Short Film Series
blurb: A woman searches for her son in a ruined future world.

name: Léon was here
blurb:
A story of love and loss.
A short film dedicated to the adolescence in the 90s. (Loosely based on a true story).

name: Smoked Fish
blurb: A tender family portrait about racism, identity, family and human connections. A story that the world needs right now.

name: Desayuno con Gallinas
blurb: Lo efímero de la juventud. Una pareja. Una noche. Una fiesta. Un momento para cambiarlo todo, al menos durante unas horas.

name: Stay Behind
blurb:
Un film sui servizi segreti e le strategie che hanno cambiato l'Italia dal dopoguerra.
 / 
An Italian spy story. Based on true events.

name: RUBATO
blurb: A Short Film by Graham Marvin

name: Nightmares and Lullabies: an Original Mini-Series
blurb: Right before his 18th birthday, a young man escapes from his foster home with his little brother: only to face his nightmares head-on.

name: GARY SCREAMS FOR YOU - An Ode to Madness
blurb: A film about a very freaky man (Gary) and his very scary compulsion to screaming at strangers in the wee hours of the night.

name: BOTTOM FEEDERS feature film
blurb: A feature film about a twenty year old squatter yearning for escape in rural Pennsylvania.

name: A Place Among the Stars
blurb: A Place Among the Stars will explore the ways in which individuals can be empowered to make a positive impact on the environment.
